title: Professional Girl Gamer Team
body:
Any girl gamers out there who want to be professional like myself I can play mid lane really well and can play adc really well. 

any rank can join. Our ranked team will be serious but not TOO serious


Hardest roles to find will be jungle and top. 

DONT BE SHY WE NEED SPOTS FILLED!

replies.body: just FYI, officer caitlyn is a guy too.
Me and Officer Caitlyn go way back, we puccied licked each other every day, idk what you are smoking.
what
I have a va**g**ina, do I qualify?
Sorry proof or nothanks
she did say she had vagina, so she is in da running :D unlike me ive got a 8 inch %%%% ;_;

If there'll be a lot of members I'd be happy to join. 

Rank: Silver 3
Role: Support > ADC > Mid > Jungle > top
I'll  create the team now :)
Is this team Siren Oce? If so I'm in. I'll take support.
You are a guy sorry

> [{quoted}](name=Officer Caitlyn,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=iHx9Y1Vy,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-18T21:16:45.640+0000)
>
> You are a guy sorry

I'm a G.I.R.L!
Only place you should be playing is in the kitchen, making us males sandwich, when we are playing league
I almost threw up in my mouth from reading this comment.

I'm a guy and i find KALIBERs Comment incredibley sexcist, There is a fact that mens lives are easier but that doesnst mean women dont do AS much stuff, infact they have done more stuff then men in the time where it was common place for women to be working, even though they are still fighting for their rights, i already know people like this guy will always exist.

I pitty men who think like this
Are we going to do some hot stuff?
Only if you want to. Don't involve me pls

the fact that they aren't depicted as an all boys team only renders your comment invalid, could only imagine the hate a thread like a 'guys only team' would get towards the female side of the community, you might think profiling yourself as a girl gamer makes you a feminist protagonist but infact it is doing the complete opposite, calling yourself a girl gamer is silly and attention seeking

I don't know about you but whenever I see 'female only' and 'male only' teams I don't think it has anything to do with play styles; I think it's more to do with creating relationships and community, aka making friends in a game. I don't think this has anything to do with Feminism or sexism?

Hello! I'm a Korean girl gamer, season 5 plat and still sitting at plat V atm. My main position is jungle, second is top/supp.
Keen to join in pro girl-only team. Please message me "AVA"= :)
This thread is hilarious
sorry can you inv me back it was inactive
remember the last time we had an all girl team... yeah. Lets not.
dont be upset because you cant join
LOL good one!
dont h8 us cos u 8nt us

my last reply:
Remember the Skt T1 team...

luv u xD
plz

Don't mind me, I just needed something to eat this popcorn with.

http://i.imgur.com/U53fASP.jpg?1

> [{quoted}](name=Officer Caitlyn,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=iHx9Y1Vy,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-18T21:09:10.106+0000)
>
> Any girl gamers out there who want to be professional like myself I can play mid lane really well and can play adc really well. 
> 
> any rank can join. Our ranked team will be serious but not TOO serious.

uhhh y do u want an all chick team????
Just wondering, ik the game is dominant by boys (like me)

Just a question, not being sexist.
STILL LOOKING FOR A TEAM BTW ;_;
i can guarantee im better than you. Your logic is flawed.
He was just asking a simple question. Why you gotta be a %%%%% to him?
excuse me ? He's asking a question that was answered in the OP and says the game is dominant by males. Untrue, just girls don't invest as much time into the game.

that's also an untrue statement. I can guarantee I put more hours into League of Legends on a daily basis than most normal people.. Including men. Being a specific gender has nothing to do with how many hours you play a game? js
tbh i bet i put more tiem in then you :-)

Guys, pls stop, the question was, y do u want an all girls team, not 'WTF, Y NO BOYS'.
It's a simple question, it's not a war u know, over sex's i mean

ahahahah .... anyways, i do think the guys do better in lol cause yes we probs spend more time playing lol which means we mostly likely have more experience with the game and stuff (no offense) (i'm trying my best to follow YiandMe's words)

that is all very true, the first game that tried to bring women into gaming was Mrs.Pacman, this is when women started to get into a 'Boys' world, if you dont give 2 fat FUKS, then dont read on.

Only then did women start to be interested in gaming, now in the modern world it's more and more usual that you see a girl playing, i mean heck just about all our sisters play a game, no matter wat it is.

This is SOOO off topic, but im trying to reply NoobxMaster
LOL no words

And also, remember the skt team
OH and yes u r better than me, i just checked ur ranked stats and also ur ranked team stats as well
****What will the rank named be?**
I have created the team check my profile for it :) It is obvious which one it is.
I'm the only one in......
Work in progress good friend. :) No1 has posted wanting to join :\
By the way, this title is misleading. You can't say you're looking to make a proffesional girl gamer team when you aren't looking to even be in any proffesional league.
cool.

then she'd / he'd betta change it to:

LOOKING 4 GIRLS TO JOIN ALL GIRL TEAM

unlike me im still trying to find a team ;_;
You girls are actually very lucky to hav Officer Caitlyn this dedicated to this all girl team
all girl teams are obnoxious and inadvertently sexist
How so? Why don't you say the same about all boys teams? (Which make up 99% of ranked teams) Double Standards lol
That 99% actually can complain to ur 1% that they're more sexist
